num0: Donald Trump: What we learned from his rally in Pennsylvania
num1: Speaking to thousands of supporters in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania, the ex-president accused Mr Biden of weaponising the FBI against him.
num2: He was in the state to promote two Republican candidates.
num3: Dr Mehmet Oz is running for the US Senate, and state Senator Doug Mastriano is in the race to become Pennsylvania's next governor.
num4: Both spoke only briefly - as always, the rally on Saturday night was really about one person: the headliner.
